channel.title: What Class Are You?
channel.description:
What Class Do You Identify As?
Ok so I’m still new to forums as most of you know, and I just thought of this fun little idea. Basically, just tell me what class you are. Which class represents you the most or summarizes you the best for the rest of you guys? You can also just pick your favorite class or the class you would want to roleplay/act as the most I don’t know. This is purely for fun I guess and maybe for a way to get to know all of you better. I don’t really care tho if this blows up or dies down, tis the way of the forums.
No rules really… any class from Throne of Lies, Forum of Lies, SFoL, Custom-Made Classes, Classes from GI, etc. Just make sure you add in what faction you are a part of as well, whether it be Blue Dragon, Unseen, Cult, Neutral, Neutral Killing, uhhhh something something Red Dragon I think… idk what other factions exist lel.
~~I hope no one else had the same idea as me though this would suck then~~
Preferable Layout (You don’t have to follow this and I won’t judge for it) [Your Name], The [Insert Class Here] [Faction] [Class Type] *Add Description or whatever you want*
Example: Intensify, The Illusionist Unseen Social Needs professional help 24/7 about trust issues

item.title: What Class Are You?
item.dc:creator: Intensify
item.description:
anon6348071:

Cult Leader, duh.
Speaking of which, feel like joining the Cult?

Pong me when you guys manage to get an illusionist and poacher into the cult

Mercenary:

Haha

You think you are very funny with this question, do you not?

Yes I am

Read full topic

item.title: What Class Are You?
item.dc:creator: clonedcheese
item.description:
[Minimash] Community Forum Mafia 2 - (5/9/31) - Game Over - ModeShifter (Alice) Wins!

ClonedCheese

Town Roboticist

Build Robot (Day): Build a chosen robot during the day. You must build each robot once before building any robot again.
Your choices are Infinite Recharge, Destination: Deep Space, and Power Up (Infinite uses)

Drive Robot (Night): Drive the robot you have created. This will have a different effect depending on which robot you drive (Infinite uses)

Infinite Recharge : Tomorrow night, target player will be able to use their action twice, while only consuming a single use if they use a limited use ability. Fails if used on a moderator candidate. You will be seen as performing the second ability.
Destination : Deep Space: Redirect your first target to your second target.
Power Up : All actions by members of the town on target player will silently fail tonight.

again
you whoever created this

Read full topic

Ok so I’m still new to forums as most of you know, and I just thought of this fun little idea. Basically, just tell me what class you are.
